attributes.action: Award Bernard Kenny the George Cross for bravery trying to save Jo Cox MP
attributes.background: Bernard Kenny is 77years old but didn't hesitate in risking his life to save that of Jo Cox MP, and he was injured in doing so. It is an act of genuine heroism that should be publicly honoured

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
